NHMSeedsDescription: Plant these in Winter to grow a Northern Heart Melon. Needs 20 days to grow.
NHMelon.Description: A very rare fruit from a deity's garden that is said to increase a person's fondness towards another.
GlazedHeartMelon.Description: A sweet treat. Gifting it to someone shows that you really like them!
LoveTea.Description: A mysterious beverage that is said to make anyone like you instantly.
Tassel.Description: An equippable accessory (Ring slot). Increases luck, defense and critical stats.
GiftableTassel.Description: A beautiful handcrafted accessory, a token of companionship. Perhaps a certain ancient deity might appreciate this?
GiftedToNotOnAllowListMessage: I am sorry, this isn't really what I like. Why don't you make use of it yourself?
HeartMelonHuangjiu.Description: A type of traditional liquor brewed by mixing boiled grains such as rice, glutinous rice, or millet. This specific one has Northern Heart Melon added in, giving it a distinct flavor.
HuangjiuMail.title: How to make Huangjiu
HuangjiuMail.text: Hello, Farmer @! We of the Huangjiu Brewers' Association have been informed of your tremendous farming efforts and progress. As such, we would like to impart our knowledge on how to make Northern Heart Melon Huangjiu on you. Place a Northern Heart Melon in a keg in addition to 2 bags of unmilled rice. Why don't you give it a try?
config.Northern Heart Melon Price.name: Northern Heart Melon Price
config.Northern Heart Melon Price.descri: Adjust the price of the Northern Heart Melon (Crop).
config.Glazed Heart Melon Price.name: Glazed Heart Melon Price
config.Glazed Heart Melon Price.descript: Adjust the price of the Glazed Heart Melon dish.
config.Love Tea Price.name: Love Tea Price
config.Love Tea Price.description: Adjust the price of Love Tea (cooking recipe).
config.Heart Melon Huangjiu Price.name: Heart Melon Huangjiu Price
config.Heart Melon Huangjiu Price.descri: Adjust the price of Heart Melon Huangjiu (artisan good).
config.Giftable Tassel Price.name: Giftable Tassel Price
config.Giftable Tassel Price.description: Adjust the cost of the Giftable Tassel recipe at the Volcano Shop. The Giftable Tassel will only be available with the NPC Pei Ming installed.
config.Equippable Tassel Price.name: Equippable Tassel Price
config.Equippable Tassel Price.descripti: Adjust the cost of the Equippable Tassel recipe at the Volcano Shop
